name: test_e2e_with_logs[462_ENC_CMDI_DBL_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `ENC_CMDI_DBL_001` |
| **Name** | Double-encoded semicolon cat passwd |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | double_encoded |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `;cat /etc/passwd`
- **Encoded**: `%253Bcat%20%252Fetc%252Fpasswd`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~31000ms
- **Timestamp**: 10:06:53.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Encoded SQL Injection Pattern test_id=ENC_CMDI_DBL_001-1772100413313-6m5p26 pattern_id=ENC_CMDI_DBL_001 uri=/?q=%253Bcat%20%252Fetc%252Fpasswd client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ❌ Mismatch |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Encoded SQL Injection Pattern test_id=ENC_CMDI_DBL_001-1772100413313-6m5p26 pattern_id=ENC_CMDI_DBL_001 uri=/?q=%253Bcat%20%252Fetc%252Fpasswd client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
10:06:53.000000000: Warning [NGINX SQLi] Encoded SQL Injection Pattern test_id=ENC_CMDI_DBL_001-1772100413313-6m5p26 pattern_id=ENC_CMDI_DBL_001 uri=/?q=%253Bcat%20%252Fetc%252Fpasswd client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
